pages.text: A cultivator must train their body to open their meridians.
$(bold)4th Stage$()$(br2)After reaching the Tempered Body 4th Stage, one begins to sense $(spiritual energy) in the atmosphere.

$(bold)7th Stage$()$(br2)At the 7th Stage, one starts to naturally gather $(spiritual energy) and absorb it into their body through their meridians while meditating, allowing them to start forming a dantian.
